extendedInfo.description: Easy Property Management for the landlord with a day job!Land Ruler DescriptionLand Ruler is an application made for landlords with a few properties looking for help keeping track of property information, researching the market, and managing repairs, contractors, and rental payments. (app is not limited to any size constraints, but not designed for high rise owners with 50 or more tenants)With Land Ruler you can:Enter a new property addressAssign a tenant from your phone contactsTrack rental payments each month for your propertyAdd contractors you regularly use for property maintenance from your phone contactsTrack and manage repairs for your propertiesView your property on google maps, streetviewResearch market information from ZillowView reports showing repair and payment historyRentals- You can easily contact your tenant via email, text, or phone from the main rental screen.- You can see current payment information and follow up with tenants if this months rent has not been received.Repairs- You can see a list of open repairs for your properties.- You can easily see the contractor assigned and quickly email, text, or call them from the main repair screen.- You can close out repairs and enter the cost of the repair (can be viewed later on the reports tab).Research on rental details- You can view zip code rental information from trulia- You can see the Zillow page for your property.- You can view google maps and google street view for your property.Reports- You can view repair history by property.- You can view payment history by property.- You can view activity history by propertyAdditional Features- Press on the rental list to open up research, and edit features- Long press on any repair to delete the repair.- From the menu, you can export your data to an xml file on your SD CardLandRulerPro provides unlimited number of rental properties.  LandRuler supports all features for 1 rental property.

reviews.title: Galaxy 3  doesn\'t work w this app.
reviews.comment: Used to get quick responses. Now nothing and the app doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: keeps getting better and better!!
reviews.comment: I appreciate that the developers are actively working on updates and improvements for this app. I\'m giving it 5 stars because even though there are a few minor things that need work... I am confident that it will be perfect in no time! There is only one other app available that I can find made for landlords and it will not work on my tablet and they are making no effort to improve it. I\'m glad I found this app.. it sure makes managing my rental properties easier!!  I love the new update for tablets....it works great on my Toshiba Thrive tablet! Keep up the Good Work and I look forward to future updates!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bring back the full properties screen
reviews.comment: This release is going in the wrong direction.  The complete list of properties with who owes or paid was better then the new GUI with only one property at a time. What were you all thinking?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App! need more features
reviews.comment: you have REPAIRS need...  Mileage Property Tax Water bill Insurance tab  when you have above added will Change to 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User
